subject: Yahoo broke Groups (again)
msgSnippet: Yahoo broke their Groups interface. Everyone needs to stay calm and accept the new interface for a while. Judging by past experience, it could take weeks
messageBody:
Yahoo broke their Groups interface. Everyone needs to stay calm and accept the new interface for a while.

   Judging by past experience, it could take weeks before they're (more or less) back to normal, I'm sure their inboxes runneth over with complaints right now.
